ru.jango.j0widget

Class TorusIndicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • ru.jango.j0widget.TorusIndicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class TorusIndicator
extends android.view.View
    Simple widget that draws an arc (part of torus) and could be used as round loading indicator. Also it can indicate some wrong situations by passing in setProgress(int) anything outside range [0, 100] (for example -1).

    • Nested Class Summary
